instruction.en: Place the round magnet at the rounded edge. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away. Repeat 3 times within 10 seconds.
instruction.nl: Plaats de ronde magneet op de afgeronde zijde. Haal de magneet weer weg als de LED knippert. Herhaal 3 keer binnen 10 seconden.

instruction.en:
Performing a manual wake-up will remove the device when the controller is in un-pairing mode

Manual Wake-Up:
1. Place the magnet on the rounded end then remove it and observe the LED blink once
2. Repeat 3 times in 10 seconds

One long LED blink means Strips has been successfully removed from your Z-Wave network
